bioconda.name: nerpa
bioconda.license: Dual-licensed under GPLv3 or CC BY-NC-SA 4.0
bioconda.summary: A tool for discovering biosynthetic gene clusters of nonribosomal peptides

biotools.summary: Nerpa is a tool for linking biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) to known nonribosomal peptides (NRPs). BGCs are predicted in genome sequences (FASTA or GBK) with antiSMASH. Known NRPs are accepted in the SMILES format and processed with rBAN.

bioschemas.name: Nerpa
bioschemas.summary: Nerpa is a tool for linking biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) to known nonribosomal peptides (NRPs). BGCs are predicted in genome sequences (FASTA or GBK) with antiSMASH. Known NRPs are accepted in the SMILES format and processed with rBAN.
